steps.default: Insert your BRI ATM card and PIN.
steps.id: Masukkan kartu ATM dan PIN BRI kamu.

steps.default: Enter your Virtual Account number : #virtualAccountNumber#, then select Continue.
steps.id: Masukkan nomor Virtual Account : #virtualAccountNumber#. lalu pilih Lanjut.

steps.default: Enter the amount to be paid. Make sure all the information is correct.
steps.id: Masukkan jumlah yang perlu dibayarkan. Pastikan semua informasi pembayaran benar.

steps.default: Payment completed. Keep your receipt as proof of payment. Your payment will be updated automatically. This may take up to 5 minutes.
steps.id: Transaksi telah selesai. Simpan struk transaksi sebagai bukti pembayaran. Tagihan kamu akan diperbarui secara otomatis dalam 5 menit.

steps.default: Log in to the BRImo application.
Enter the amount to be paid if needed.
steps.id: Masukkan nominal yang akan dibayarkan jika perlu.

steps.default: Enter your PIN, then select Send.
Your transaction is completed. Keep your notification as proof of payment. Your payment will be updated automatically. This may take up to 5 minutes.
steps.id: Transaksi telah selesai. Simpan notifikasi yang muncul sebagai bukti pembayaran. Tagihan kamu akan diperbarui secara otomatis dalam 5 menit.
